rdf:Description.dc:title: Evaluation of a telepsychiatry pilot project 1997
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Doze, Sandra.
Simpson, Jennifer.
Alberta Heritage Foundation for Medical Research.
Alberta. Provincial Mental Health Advisory Board.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Alberta Heritage Foundation for Medical Research,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Provides details of a telepsychiatry pilot project undertaken by the Provincial Mental Health Advisory Board-Central Alberta in cooperation with four Regional Health Authorities.
Supplements an earlier report which describes the pilot project evaluation.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Telecommunication in medicine
Telemedicine.
Remote Consultation
Mental Health.
Mental Disorders.
